articles.title: Devin McCourty on ’25 Patriots: ‘A lot different than us’
articles.description:
"I just think they have a mentality of — we can go and beat anybody."

The post Devin McCourty on ’25 Patriots: ‘A lot different than us’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Devin McCourty comments on the 2025 Patriots' winning mentality compared to past teams.
McCourty highlights the team's confidence to compete against any opponent.
Local fans may see a shift in team culture and performance expectations.

articles.title: Woman who posed as student at Boston high schools accepts plea deal, sentenced to probation
articles.description:
The Canton woman enrolled as a teen at three high schools in the Boston Public Schools district during the 2022 to 2023 academic year.

The post Woman who posed as student at Boston high schools accepts plea deal, sentenced to probation appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Canton woman, 29, posed as a student in Boston high schools during 2022-2023.
She enrolled in three Boston Public Schools, misleading staff and students.
Sentenced to probation, her actions raise concerns about school security and student safety.

articles.title: BPS pauses new hiring amid deficit as district predicts hundreds of layoffs next year
articles.description:
The partial hiring freeze comes as the School Committee voted to close three schools by 2027, affecting hundreds of teacher and paraprofessional roles.

The post BPS pauses new hiring amid deficit as district predicts hundreds of layoffs next year appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: BPS implements a hiring freeze due to a budget deficit affecting future staffing.
Three schools will close by 2027, impacting hundreds of teachers and paraprofessionals.
Predicted layoffs next year could significantly disrupt education for Boston students.

articles.title: From SNL-style ‘Weekend Updates’ to a TD Garden beer chug, Will Campbell isn’t afraid to bring the laughs
articles.description:
He's also Drake Maye's top pick for which Patriot would make the best Sports Illustrated swimsuit model.

The post From SNL-style ‘Weekend Updates’ to a TD Garden beer chug, Will Campbell isn’t afraid to bring the laughs appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Will Campbell brings humor to Boston sports with SNL-style updates and beer chugs at TD Garden.
Drake Maye names Campbell as the top choice for a Sports Illustrated swimsuit model from the Patriots.
Campbell's comedic approach enhances local sports culture, engaging Boston fans and fostering community spirit.

articles.title: Police searching for Dorchester girl missing since Thursday
articles.description:
Police are looking for Mela Rosario, 17, after she was last seen near a Brockton courthouse, BPD says.

The post Police searching for Dorchester girl missing since Thursday appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Police are searching for 17-year-old Mela Rosario, missing since Thursday.
Mela was last seen near a Brockton courthouse, according to BPD.
Community members are urged to assist in locating her for safety.

articles.title: Devin McCourty explains ‘travesty’ following Belichick, Kraft Hall-of-Fame snubs
articles.description:
"The only talk is going to be about the guys who didn’t get in the Hall of Fame.”

The post Devin McCourty explains ‘travesty’ following Belichick, Kraft Hall-of-Fame snubs appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Devin McCourty criticizes Hall of Fame snubs of Bill Belichick and Robert Kraft.
Belichick and Kraft, pivotal to Patriots' success, remain unrecognized by the Hall of Fame.
Local fans express disappointment over the perceived injustice affecting Boston's sports legacy.
